titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of September 1, 1987, as "Working Mothers' Day".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Authorizes and requests the President to designate September 1, 1987, as Working Mothers' Day.
